gjs-html:
Hi   "John Doe"

Verify Your Email Account

Thanks for signingup for the Campaignrabbit. Please click confirm button for subscription to start receiving our emails.

Confirm your email address @ Campaignrabbit | Your Street Name, 123 Your City Name, Country Name If you have any quetions please contact us hello@email.com | 123-456-7890

gjs-customHtml:
Hi "John Doe"

Verify Your Email Account

Thanks for signingup for the Campaignrabbit. Please click confirm button for subscription to start receiving our emails.

Confirm your email address
Share
Tweet
+1
@ Campaignrabbit | Your Street Name, 123 Your City Name, Country Name
If you have any quetions please contact us hello@email.com | 123-456-7890
